metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3466 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The pg_ctlcluster script in postgresql-common in versions prior to 210 didn't drop privileges when creating socket/statistics temporary directories, which could result in local privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: postgresql-common: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
